Method.name: Assign
Method.Implementation: if (oProxy '= "") { #dim properties As %ListOfObjects do oProxy.%CopyToArray(.properties) if ($data(properties) = 10) { set ..Coordinates = $get(properties("coordinates")) set ..CreatedAt = $get(properties("created_at")) set ..FavoriteCount = $get(properties("favorite_count")) //set ..Ids = $get(properties("id")) set ..IdStr = $get(properties("id_str")) set ..InReplyToStatusId = $get(properties("in_reply_to_status_id")) set ..InReplyToUserId = $get(properties("in_reply_to_user_id")) set ..InReplyToScreenName = $get(properties("in_reply_to_screen_name")) set ..Lang = $get(properties("lang")) set ..Place= $get(properties("place")) set ..Retweeted = ##class(Util.Misc).ConvertToBool($get(properties("retweeted"))) set ..RetweetCount= $get(properties("retweet_count")) set ..Source = $get(properties("source")) set ..Text = $get(properties("text")) set ..Truncated = ##class(Util.Misc).ConvertToBool($get(properties("truncated"))) set ..User = oProxy.user."screen_name" } } quit $$$OK

Method.name: CreateOrOpenId
CleanValue
Method.Implementation: #dim text As Util.UnlimitedString = value set text = ##class(Util.Misc).RegexpReplace(text, "^RT @\w+:? ?", "") set text = ##class(Util.Misc).RegexpReplace(text, "\bRT @\w+:? ?", "\n") set text = ##class(Util.Misc).RegexpReplace(text, "\bhttps?:\S+", "") // set text = ##class(Util.Misc).RegexpReplace(text, "(\S)([\.,;?!:])(\S)", "$1$2 $3") // BUGBUG: it splits 1.5 set text = ##class(Util.Misc).RegexpReplace(text, "(\S)([\.,;?!:])([^\d\s])", "$1$2 $3") quit text

Method.name: CreatedAtSet
Method.Implementation: #dim status as %Status = $$$OK set i%CreatedAt = createdAt set i%CreatedAtDateTime = ..GetFromTwitterTime(createdAt) quit status

Method.name: CalculatePlace
CalculatedPlaceGet
GetFromTwitterTime
Method.Description: <var>twitterTime<var> will be in this format "Wed Aug 27 13:08:45 +0000 2008"
Method.Implementation:
quit:twitterTime="" "" #dim mmm as %String #dim d as %String #dim yyyy as %String #dim t as %String #dim tz as %String set $lb(,mmm,d,t,tz,yyyy) = $listfromstring(twitterTime," ")
#dim dformat as %Integer = 6 #dim tformat as %Integer = 5 #dim datetime as %String = mmm _ " " _ d _ " " _ yyyy _ "T" _ t _ tz #dim localeopt as %Boolean = 1 #dim h as %String = $zdatetimeh(datetime,dformat,tformat,,,,,,,,localeopt) quit h

Method.name: TestGetFromTwitterTime
Method.Implementation: #dim twitterTime as %String = "Wed Aug 27 13:08:45 +0000 2008" set h = ..GetFromTwitterTime(twitterTime) write $zdatetime(h), ", ", $piece(h, ",", 1), ", ", $piece(h, ",", 2), !

Method.name: GetEmojiScore
